participant_1.name: Kyle Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, Kyle loves engaging with others and enjoys challenges.
participant_1.background: i enjoy being around people. i like to workout a a times a week. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i am a professional wrestler.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily finds joy in simple things and values family and companionship.
participant_2.background: i enjoy coloring books. my husband is adopted. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community.

content.text: I am in the wrestling team
